metadata.synopsis: Balthazar tells the player to enter the water to reach Nightsong's prison. He insists that the player goes first.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically when Balthazar reaches the Shadowfell entrance

0.speaker: Balthazar
0.text: Beyond lies Nightsong's sanctum. Soon, you will be privileged to see a true masterwork.

1.speaker: Balthazar
1.text: Come now, do not tarry. Enter the waters.
